title: upgrades?
body: <!-- id=323--><!-- isMature=0 -->i've been thinking of upgrading this profile thingy.  i think i'm gonna add a field to give credit to wherever i get a link from, and probably some other fields as well (categories maybe?).  also, i think i'm gonna make an rss feed.  one of these days i'll do this mofo in .NET, but since i rarely do any asp, it might be good practice to stick with using crappy asp.  maybe one day i'll get more than five regular readers ;-)
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-02-24

upgrades?

i've been thinking of upgrading this profile thingy. i think i'm gonna add a field to give credit to wherever i get a link from, and probably some other fields as well (categories maybe?). also, i think i'm gonna make an rss feed. one of these days i'll do this mofo in .NET, but since i rarely do any asp, it might be good practice to stick with using crappy asp. maybe one day i'll get more than five regular readers ;-)
